End of season reminder

Reminder mail at end of Burning Expedition

<color=maroon><size=80>REMINDER</size></color>
■ Remember to do your <b>Elemental Lord</b>
■ At reset, remember to refresh your <b>Alliance Challenge</b> until the quests are all <color=yellow>gold</color>
■ Hit the <b>Lava Cave</b> as soon as you can.
■ It's free server transfer week. After you port back to Normal Land, <b>shield up</b>!
■ ESI will be at UTC 1800 as usual

Quack! Quack!
~ Commander Ducky <color=yellow>(^)></color>
REMINDER
■ Remember to do your Elemental Lord
■ At reset, remember to refresh your Alliance Challenge until the quests are all gold
■ Hit the Lava Cave as soon as you can.
■ It's free server transfer week. After you port back to Normal Land, shield up!
■ ESI will be at UTC 1800 as usual

Quack! Quack!
~ Commander Ducky (^)>
